page.title: 08Worlingworth farm engineers
page.content: Q1What sort of things do you do? A1We sell & repair farm machinery.Sell chemical fungicides,insecticides,weed- killers & fertilizers.We also farm for wheat,beet,peas etc.,some of this being experimental. Q2Is yours a long established family business? A2Established by the founder member of the family in 1953 it has a branch in Ardleigh near Colchester providing a similar service.Senior managment is still within the family. Q3You are connected with farms.Which are you most involved with,selling new equipment or repairs? A3About 50/50 though in the future pro- bably less repair work will be done. Q4How do you see the future of farming & its effect on your business? A4Less labour intensive but eventually all food grown will be marketed.
